sendConfirm(email:String, code:String) — method, class com.nitrolm.LicenseClient
This method sends a confirmation code that the user received in an e-mail to the NitroLM server in order to confirm them as a valid user.
sendSurvey(reseller:String, data:com.nitrolm.data:Map) — method, class com.nitrolm.LicenseClient
This method sends a reseller survey.
setProxy(host:String, port:int, user:String, pass:String, nonProxyHosts:String) — method, class com.nitrolm.LicenseClient
Set HTTP proxy settings for communicating to NitroLM.
setup — Event, class com.nitrolm.modules.spark.EncryptedModuleLoader
Dispatched when information about the module is available (with the info() method), but the module is not yet ready.
setUserFile(productCode:String, filename:String) — method, class com.nitrolm.LicenseClient
This method saves a user file on the license server.
setUserVar(productCode:String, varname:String, value:String) — method, class com.nitrolm.LicenseClient
This method sets a user-specific variable on the license server.
